subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Pacman Jones, the suspended Dallas Cowboys cornerback, said he would like to be called by his given name, Adam, and make his nickname a thing of the past. “There’s really just a lot of negativity behind it,” Jones said. “It’s just time for a change, man.”.
